com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.behavior

Class DynamicTouchListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.helper.ItemTouchHelper.Callback
      • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.behavior.DynamicTouchListener

  • public class DynamicTouchListener
extends ItemTouchHelper.Callback
    Simple item touch helper extending ItemTouchHelper.Callback which can be used with DynamicTouchAdapter to provide basic touch callbacks depending on your use case.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class android.support.v7.widget.helper.ItemTouchHelper.Callback
